argument.name: data
argument.description: An array of JSON objects with data to populate the List.

argument.name: flagKeepValue
argument.description: Optional. Default value is false. A true/false value that defines whether or not the currently selected value in the List should be selected after the List has been re-populated.

argument.name: animate
argument.description: Optional. Default value is false. An object or false value. If false, the List will not be animated when populated. Otherwise, a JSON object defining the animation to be used when the List is populated. The animate object can have the following properties:

item.name: type
item.description: The type of animation. Can be 'slide-left' or 'slide-right'.

item.name: duration
item.description: The length of the animation in milliseconds.

argument.name: flagFireEvents
argument.description: Optional. Default value is true. A true/false value that specifies whether or not the populate events, 'onBeforePopulate' and 'onPopulate', should be executed when the List is populated.

page.description: Populates a List control with data.
